Is this necessary, or would you just augment `BaseContext` instead? It also seems like the purpose of `ParameterizedContext` is to add custom extensions to `BaseContext` (via `CustomT` and `Middleware`):

https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/9f59635899ed15815241c55bc795fe371393b469/types/koa/index.d.ts#L500-L502
I only want to add to `ctx`, but `BaseContext` will also add to `context`.
